roleset.name: to sing or play with a vibratory or quavering effect
roleset.note: TRILL-V NOTES: Member of Vncls animal_sounds-38, manner_speaking-37.3, sound_emission-43.2. Updated by Julia, 11/2010. (from trill.01-v)

example.name: all args, with DSP link
example.text: S-["Now, V-kun," she trilled *trace*-? at him as she dodged a dozen or so kicks to the head, "you're not playing the right game!"]
example.arg: *trace*-? (tag on the '?' leaf node itself, and then '*' link to the parent S node containing the entire utterance)
as she dodged a dozen or so kicks to the head
